group_1.textLeft: ...Well then, it's 'bout time to go to the hospital@Miwarin's in.
We've got Shigurin and the others waiting.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I'll go check the door and the windows!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, please do.

group_1.textRight: Hey, Instructor.
Just how come you're so hung up@on the Fire Festival?
Has it, like, got something to do with your wish@when you became a Magical Girl?

group_1.textLeft: Ahh... That reminds me, I haven't properly told you@about that yet, have I?
Since you told me about your wish,@I shall tell you mine as well.

group_1.textRight: Oh, don't worry about it, 'kay? Not like I'm gonna@force it out of you or anything...

group_1.textLeft: No, Your Highness, I want to tell you about this.
I want you to know that I've prepared myself.

group_1.textRight: ...Then I gotcha★

group_1.textLeft: Thanks.
...The Fire Festival brought me various experiences@and a connection with the Youth Association,
so for me, it's incredibly important...
But a few years ago, a movement was started@to abolish the Festival...
The thought that I might lose something@so important terrified me...
That's why, I wished to@"make the Fire Festival remain"...

group_1.textRight: I see...@It was something truly precious to you, right...

group_1.textLeft: Indeed...@But I'm just being childish, aren't I?

group_1.textRight: Duh, all Magical Girls are childish!
Plus, Instructor, it's exactly 'cause you've got such@stubborn, hard-core feelings...
That I'm sure you'd fit right in with us@Neo-Magius gals! Kyaha★

group_1.textLeft: ...Really...?@Then, it's okay, right...
It's okay if I can't get over my chagrin...@my feelings... right?

group_1.textRight: [chara:102801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: ...Actually, just before you arrived, all of the@Youth Association was gathered together.
I was hoping that everyone would stick together...
And bounce back to revive the Festival,@like in the past...
But... the Youth Association that I loved@is just a dream...
They've already given up on the Festival, saying@it's a shame but can't be helped...

group_1.textRight: Instructor...
...[wait:0.8][chara:102801:cheek_0][chara:102801:motion_300][chara:102801:lipSynch_1]I dunno how to put it, but it's sad, right?
I mean, to lose your roots, which you cherished@so much...

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.@However...
I will soon change such a reality.
Thanks to everyone in the Youth Association,@I was able to make up my mind.
I'm going to promote Magical Girl supremacy@and make myself a god.
I'll show every one of them... that the god is@standing right here in front of them.
And then, as a god, it is my desire to bring back@the Fire Festival.
So... I don't care if I'm feared,@I don't care if I'm hated...
By any means necessary...@I WILL become a living god...!

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:0.8][chara:102801:cheek_0][chara:102801:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:102801:motion_100][chara:102801:lipSynch_1]Kyaha★
The idea of using force instead of persuasion@to subdue your surroundings?
This cutie likes that.

group_1.textLeft: The honor is all mine.

group_1.textRight: I knew it was just as I felt, Instructor;@you're serious trouble★

group_1.textLeft: I don't want to hear that from you, Princess.

group_1.textRight: Well, just so ya know, that was a compliment!

group_1.textLeft: I'll take it as one, then.

group_1.textRight: Lady San, Lady San!@Sorry to keep you waiting!
I checked the doors, and they're all locked!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, Miyu.
Well then, Princess, shall we go?
(A new world where Magical Girl supremacy@is widespread...)
(That's the top we're aiming for...!)

group_1.textCenter: No matter what I have to sacrifice...@I will become a god...!
